From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin īnsistere, with normal change of conjugation to -ir.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central, Balearic) [in.sisˈti]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [in.sisˈtiɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)

Verb

[edit]

insistir (first-person singular present insisteixo, first-person singular preterite insistí, past participle insistit)

  1. to insist

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of insistir (third conjugation, with -eix-)
infinitive insistir
gerund insistint
past participle masculine feminine
singular insistit insistida
plural insistits insistides
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present insisteixo insisteixes insisteix insistim insistiu insisteixen
imperfect insistia insisties insistia insistíem insistíeu insistien
future insistiré insistiràs insistirà insistirem insistireu insistiran
preterite insistí insistires insistí insistírem insistíreu insistiren
conditional insistiria insistiries insistiria insistiríem insistiríeu insistirien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present insisteixi insisteixis insisteixi insistim insistiu insisteixin
imperfect insistís insistissis insistís insistíssim insistíssiu insistissin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — insisteix insisteixi insistim insistiu insisteixin
negative (no) — no insisteixis no insisteixi no insistim no insistiu no insisteixin

Related terms

[edit]
  • insistència
  • insistent

Further reading

[edit]
  • “insistir”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “insistir”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “insistir” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “insistir” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Galician

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /insisˈtiɾ/ [in.s̺is̺ˈt̪iɾ]
  • Rhymes: -iɾ
  • Hyphenation: in‧sis‧tir

Verb

[edit]

insistir (first-person singular present insisto, first-person singular preterite insistín, past participle insistido)
insistir (first-person singular present insisto, first-person singular preterite insistim or insisti, past participle insistido, reintegrationist norm)

  1. to insist

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of insistir
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(ti) 		Third-person
(el / ela / Vde.) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / Vdes.)

Related terms

[edit]
  • insistencia

Further reading

[edit]
  • “insistir”, in Dicionario da Real Academia Galega (in Galician), A Coruña: Royal Galician Academy, 2012–2025
  • “insistir”, in Dicionário Estraviz de galego (in Galician), 2014–2025

Occitan

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio (Béarn):(file)
This entry needs pronunciation information. If you are familiar with the IPA then please add some!

Verb

[edit]

insistir

  1. to insist

Conjugation

[edit]

This verb needs an inflection-table template.

Related terms

[edit]
  • insisténcia
  • insistent
  • insistentament

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin īnsistere, with change of conjugation.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ĩ.sisˈt͡ʃi(ʁ)/ [ĩ.sisˈt͡ʃi(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ĩ.sisˈt͡ʃi(ʁ)/ [ĩ.sisˈt͡ʃi(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /ĩ.sisˈt͡ʃi(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /ĩ.siʃˈt͡ʃi(ʁ)/ [ĩ.siʃˈt͡ʃi(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /ĩ.sisˈt͡ʃi(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ĩ.siʃˈtiɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ĩ.siʃˈtiɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /ĩ.siʃˈti.ɾi/

  • (Northeast Brazil) IPA(key): /ĩ.siʃˈti(χ)/
  • Audio (Brazil (Caipira)):(file)
  • Hyphenation: in‧sis‧tir

Verb

[edit]

insistir (first-person singular present insisto, first-person singular preterite insisti, past participle insistido)

  1. to insist

Conjugation

[edit]

(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)

Impersonal insistir
Personal insistir insistires insistir insistirmos insistirdes insistirem

insistindo
Past participle
Masculine insistido insistidos
Feminine insistida insistidas

Present insisto insistes insiste insistimos insistis insistem
Imperfect insistia insistias insistia insistíamos insistíeis insistiam

Related terms

[edit]
  • insistência
  • insistente

Further reading

[edit]
  • “insistir”, in Dicionário Priberam da Língua Portuguesa (in Portuguese), Lisbon: Priberam, 2008–2025

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin īnsistere.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /insisˈtiɾ/ [ĩn.sisˈt̪iɾ]
  • Rhymes: -iɾ
  • Syllabification: in‧sis‧tir

Verb

[edit]

insistir (first-person singular present insisto, first-person singular preterite insistí, past participle insistido)

  1. to insist

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of insistir (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive insistir
gerund insistiendo
past participle masculine feminine
singular insistido insistida
plural insistidos insistidas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present insisto insistestú
insistísvos 		insiste insistimos insistís insisten
imperfect insistía insistías insistía insistíamos insistíais insistían
preterite insistí insististe insistió insistimos insististeis insistieron
future insistiré insistirás insistirá insistiremos insistiréis insistirán
conditional insistiría insistirías insistiría insistiríamos insistiríais insistirían
subjunctive yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present insista insistastú
insistásvos2 		insista insistamos insistáis insistan
imperfect
(ra) 		insistiera insistieras insistiera insistiéramos insistierais insistieran
imperfect
(se) 		insistiese insistieses insistiese insistiésemos insistieseis insistiesen
future1 insistiere insistieres insistiere insistiéremos insistiereis insistieren
imperative — tú
vos 		usted nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ustedes
affirmative insistetú
insistívos 		insista insistamos insistid insistan
negative no insistas no insista no insistamos no insistáis no insistan

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.

    Selected combined forms of insistir

These forms are generated automatically and may not actually be used. Pronoun usage varies by region.

singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
with infinitive insistir dative insistirme insistirte insistirle, insistirse insistirnos insistiros insistirles, insistirse
accusative insistirme insistirte insistirlo, insistirla, insistirse insistirnos insistiros insistirlos, insistirlas, insistirse
with gerund insistiendo dative insistiéndome insistiéndote insistiéndole, insistiéndose insistiéndonos insistiéndoos insistiéndoles, insistiéndose
accusative insistiéndome insistiéndote insistiéndolo, insistiéndola, insistiéndose insistiéndonos insistiéndoos insistiéndolos, insistiéndolas, insistiéndose
with informal second-person singular tú imperative insiste dative insísteme insístete insístele insístenos not used insísteles
accusative insísteme insístete insístelo, insístela insístenos not used insístelos, insístelas
with informal second-person singular vos imperative insistí dative insistime insistite insistile insistinos not used insistiles
accusative insistime insistite insistilo, insistila insistinos not used insistilos, insistilas
with formal second-person singular imperative insista dative insístame not used insístale, insístase insístanos not used insístales
accusative insístame not used insístalo, insístala, insístase insístanos not used insístalos, insístalas
with first-person plural imperative insistamos dative not used insistámoste insistámosle insistámonos insistámoos insistámosles
accusative not used insistámoste insistámoslo, insistámosla insistámonos insistámoos insistámoslos, insistámoslas
with informal second-person plural imperative insistid dative insistidme not used insistidle insistidnos insistíos insistidles
accusative insistidme not used insistidlo, insistidla insistidnos insistíos insistidlos, insistidlas
with formal second-person plural imperative insistan dative insístanme not used insístanle insístannos not used insístanles, insístanse
accusative insístanme not used insístanlo, insístanla insístannos not used insístanlos, insístanlas, insístanse

Related terms

[edit]
  • insistencia
  • insistente

Further reading

[edit]
